successStories.name: Joseph Ageng'o
successStories.achievement: Electrical Engineering â€¢ Technical University of Kenya
successStories.story: With consistent mentoring from the Career Guidance, Joseph focused on core STEM subjects, participated in county Olympiads, and developed analytical skills that secured him a top rank.

successStories.name: Jim Luvisia
successStories.achievement: Bachelor Of Education Science At JOOUST
successStories.story: Through tailored guidance in biology and chemistry, Jim received structured support for competitive exams and gained confidence via mock tests, workshops, and mentorship programs.

successStories.name: Alphonce Ageng'o
successStories.story: Alphonce honed his legal aptitude, critical thinking, and interview skills under the mentorship of teachers, ultimately excelling in the national examination.

successStories.name: Mary Adoyo
successStories.story: Mary academic excellence and global exposure were nurtured through leadership programs, essay-writing workshops, and college application guidance.

successStories.name: Michael Omondi
successStories.story: Michael's passion for computer science was identified early. With SAT prep, essay coaching, and guidance, he earned a full ride to one of the top universities.

successStories.name: Nyadida
successStories.story: Nyadida received intensive support in leadership skills and professional exam preparation.
